item.title: 强生公司正考虑以200多亿美元出售骨科业务部门
item.description: 据知情人士透露，强生公司正筹备出售其计划剥离的骨科业务部门，多家大型私募股权公司已对此虎视眈眈。【原文：Johnson & Johnson is preparing a potential sale of the orthopedics unit that it has been planning to separate, with big buyout firms already circling, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: YPF首席执行官为页岩油推进筹备资金，米莱力挺石油产业
item.description: 阿根廷石油公司（YPF SA）正拨出专项资金，确保在瓦卡穆尔塔盆地这个快速增长的油气田持续投入，即便今年油价下跌也不例外。这家由自由主义总统哈维尔·米莱亲自挑选的管理层执掌的国有企业，正致力于将其打造成全球页岩油巨头。【原文：YPF SA is setting aside funds to keep spending in the fast-growing Vaca Muerta basin even if oil prices fall this year as management handpicked by libertarian President Javier Milei looks to build the state-run company into a global shale star.】

item.title: H.I.G.选择中端市场实物资产，软件行业陷入低迷

item.title: 沃尔玛在谨慎预测中指出令人担忧的经济指标
item.description: 作为消费支出的风向标，沃尔玛公司指出当前存在"招聘衰退"现象且消费者面临压力，因此预测今年盈利增长将低于华尔街预期。【原文：Walmart Inc., a bellwether of consumer spending, cited a “hiring recession” and pressures on shoppers as it forecast less growth in earnings this year than Wall Street was expecting.】

item.title: 国际能源署会议在分歧中落幕，美国力推废除净零目标
item.description: 在西方最重要的能源预测机构会议上，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普与主要欧洲国家政府的立场分歧浮出水面。【原文：The conflicting positions of US President Donald Trump and major European governments came to the fore at a meeting of the west’s most important energy forecaster.】

item.title: 亿万富翁弗里德兰德认为，随着美国寻求从刚果民主共和国获取关键矿产，该国蕴藏着增长机遇。
item.description: 伊凡霍矿业公司认为，随着各方终于意识到刚果民主共和国对美国及其他西方经济体供应关键矿产的重要性，该公司将迎来大量增长机遇。【原文：Ivanhoe Mines Ltd. sees plenty of growth opportunities as “the penny has finally dropped” on the Democratic Republic of the Congo’s importance in supplying critical minerals to the US and other Western economies.】

item.title: 合并能源贷款提供自2023年以来最大折扣
item.description: 针对甲醇生产商联合能源有限公司旗下两家子公司的一笔3.3亿美元杠杆贷款正在市场推广，其折扣幅度将创下逾两年来的最高纪录。【原文：A $330 million leveraged loan to two units of methanol maker Consolidated Energy Ltd. is being marketed at what would be the biggest discount in over two years.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦与美国签署协议，将翻新纽约市罗斯福酒店
item.description: 巴基斯坦同意与美国合作翻新曼哈顿的罗斯福酒店，标志着其改造计划取得进展。这座曾因收容移民而被称为"新埃利斯岛"的建筑，如今将被赋予新用途。【原文：Pakistan agreed to work with the US to revamp the Roosevelt Hotel in Manhattan, marking a step forward in its plans to re-purpose a building once dubbed the “New Ellis Island” for its role in sheltering migrants.】

item.title: 墨西哥央行指出对亚洲商品征收关税存在不确定性
item.description: 墨西哥央行董事会多数成员承认，该国政府近期对亚洲进口商品征收关税所引发的价格压力仍存在不确定性，但同时将潜在通胀冲击描述为"暂时且有限"。【原文：The majority of Mexico’s central bank board acknowledges lingering uncertainty on price pressures from tariffs the Mexican government recently imposed on Asian imports, though it described the potential inflationary hit as “temporary and limited.”】

item.title: 特朗普关税政策使美国对华贸易逆差降至21年最低水平
item.description: 2025年，美国对华年度贸易逆差缩小至二十余年来最低水平，而对墨西哥和越南的贸易逆差则扩大至历史新高——特朗普总统实施的全面关税政策重塑了全球贸易格局。【原文：The US annual trade deficit with China shrank in 2025 to the smallest in more than two decades — and widened to record levels with Mexico and Vietnam — as President Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs reordered global trade.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率跌至逾三年最低水平
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率降至2022年9月以来最低水平，购房负担能力正逐步改善。【原文：US mortgage rates fell to the lowest level since September 2022 as affordability slowly improves.】

item.title: 埃普斯坦丑闻震动巴德学院掌舵者 五十年掌控后失守
item.description: 利昂·博特斯坦耗费半个世纪，将巴德学院从纽约哈德逊河谷的一所小校，发展成以进步理念著称的精英文理学院。【原文：Leon Botstein spent half a century building Bard College from a tiny school in New York’s Hudson Valley into an elite liberal arts institution known for its progressive agenda.】

item.title: 资产管理公司股价暴跌，因蓝猫基金限制赎回
item.description: 周四，另类资产管理公司股价暴跌，此前蓝猫资本公司限制了其一只面向零售客户的私募信贷基金的赎回，这给近期面临严格监管的行业再添打击。【原文：Shares of alternative asset managers tumbled on Thursday after Blue Owl Capital Inc. restricted withdrawals from one of its retail-focused private credit funds, a fresh blow to a sector that’s faced heightened scrutiny in recent weeks.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰股价下跌，赎回暂停引发私募信贷担忧
item.description: 蓝猫资本公司股价暴跌，此前该公司决定限制其一只私募信贷基金的赎回，引发市场对这个1.8万亿美元市场潜在风险的新担忧。【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc. shares tumbled after a decision to restrict withdrawals from one of its private credit funds raised fresh concern over the risks bubbling under the surface of the $1.8 trillion market.】

item.title: 嘉能可接近完成出售哈萨克斯坦Kazzinc矿业业务
item.description: 嘉能可公司正就出售其在哈萨克斯坦Kazzinc有限公司的股份与当地商人沙赫穆拉特·穆塔利普进行谈判，这是可能重塑该国庞大矿业格局的一系列交易之一。【原文：Glencore Plc is in talks to sell its stake in Kazzinc Ltd. in Kazakhstan to local businessman Shakhmurat Mutalip as part of a series of deals that could reshape the country’s vast mining landscape.】

item.title: 加拿大能源股瞄准2008年以来首次创纪录高点，因油价飙升
item.description: 加拿大能源股有望创下近十八年来首次收盘新高，这得益于油价和天然气价格的上涨，以及投资者对该板块兴趣的回归。【原文：Canadian energy shares are poised for their first record close in nearly eighteen years, helped by rising oil and natural gas prices and a return of investor interest in the sector.】

item.title: 景顺、嘉敏纳押注美国国债，认为降息必要性微乎其微
item.description: 景顺投资和嘉明资产管理公司的基金经理指出，债券市场普遍认为美联储今年至少还会再降息两次，但这种观点与美国经济的韧性相悖。这些机构正押注美国国债价格将下跌。【原文：The bond market’s consensus view that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates at least twice more this year is at odds with US economic resilience, say portfolio managers at Invesco Ltd. and Carmignac, who are betting against Treasuries.】

item.title: 报告称美国资助中国实验室开展价值10亿美元的研究
item.description: 一项新研究指出，近十亿美元的美国政府资金近年来推动了一系列涉及中国国防实验室的研究项目，该研究认为围绕此类合作的安全政策已然失效。【原文：Almost $1 billion in US government funding helped fuel a series of research projects involving defense labs in China in recent years, according to a new study that concludes security policies around such partnerships have failed.】

item.title: EQT预计风暴推高天然气价格将带来10亿美元意外之财
item.description: EQT公司仅在2月份就将赚取10亿美元，这家天然气生产商凭借其得天独厚的优势，在去年美国天然气市场史上最剧烈的价格上涨之一来临前获益匪浅。【原文：EQT Corp. stands to pocket $1 billion in February alone as the natural gas producer reaps the benefits of its fortuitous position ahead of one of the steepest price rallies in the history of the US gas market last month.】

item.title: AppLovin在竞购TikTok失败后计划打造自有社交平台
item.description: 移动广告公司AppLovin Corp.去年收购TikTok中国以外资产的计划失败后，正着手打造社交网络平台。【原文：AppLovin Corp. is preparing to build a social networking platform after the mobile advertising company’s failed bid to buy TikTok’s assets outside of China last year.】

item.title: 美股反弹受阻，伊朗冲突打压风险偏好
item.description: 上周因人工智能引发的恐慌情绪推动美股反弹，但周四早盘因地缘政治新闻令交易员感到紧张，反弹势头戛然而止。【原文：The comeback in US equities from last week’s artificial intelligence jitters stalled early Thursday as geopolitical headlines put traders on edge.】

item.title: 纽约叫停自动驾驶出租车计划，对Waymo扩张构成打击
item.description: 纽约州州长凯西·霍楚撤回了一项允许在纽约市以外地区开展商业无人驾驶出租车服务的提案，这对谷歌母公司Alphabet旗下的Waymo公司构成打击——该公司正计划在今年大力扩张其无人驾驶车队规模。【原文：New York Governor Kathy Hochul has pulled a proposal that would have allowed for commercial robotaxi services outside New York City, a blow to Alphabet Inc.’s Waymo as it seeks to aggressively expand its driverless fleet this year.】

item.title: 卡什卡里痛批哈塞特对纽约联储关税分析的批评
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔·卡什卡里表示，国家经济委员会主任凯文·哈塞特近期批评纽约联储关税研究报告的言论，损害了中央银行的独立性。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari said recent comments by National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett critical of a New York Fed study on tariffs undermine the central bank’s independence.】

item.title: NFL名人堂成员史蒂夫·杨的HGGC公司募集新基金32亿美元，超额完成目标
item.description: 由名人堂四分卫史蒂夫·杨共同创立的私募股权公司HGGC，为其第五期基金筹集了32亿美元资金，尽管募资环境低迷，仍超额完成了最初目标。【原文：HGGC, the private equity firm co-founded by Hall of Fame quarterback Steve Young, amassed $3.2 billion for its fifth fund, exceeding its initial target despite a muted fundraising environment.】

item.title: Mistral首席执行官称，少数企业主导的人工智能领域存在市场滥用风险
item.description: 法国领先的人工智能公司首席执行官警告称，世界正面临让少数几家公司主导人工智能的风险，这种集中度将增加领先企业滥用其对新兴技术控制权的可能性。【原文：The world is at risk of allowing a handful of companies to dominate artificial intelligence, and such a concentration raises the likelihood that the leading players will abuse their control over the emerging technology, the chief executive officer of France’s leading AI firm warned.】

item.title: 沙特控股的Scopely收购土耳其Loom Games多数股权
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯拥有的游戏工作室Scopely公司已同意收购土耳其开发工作室Loom Games的多数股权，此举正值该王国致力于转型为电子游戏中心之际。【原文：Saudi-owned gaming studio Scopely Inc. has agreed to take a majority stake in Turkish development studio Loom Games, as the kingdom seeks to transform itself into a video gaming hub.】

item.title: 土耳其考虑扩大市场操纵处罚范围
item.description: 据知情人士透露，土耳其政府计划对市场欺诈行为实施比最初提案更为严厉的惩罚措施。【原文：The Turkish government is planning to introduce tougher punishments for market fraud than what had originally been proposed, according to people familiar with the matter.】
